typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{col13/4col23/4col33/4col43/4col5} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(column1 = replace({col13/4col23/4col33/4col43/4col5},'3/4',',')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['test.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		column1
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
